description: Numbers whose set of base 10 digits is {3,4}.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..35000] | Set(IntegerToSequence(n, 10)) subset {3, 4}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 30 2012(PARI) A032834(n)=vector(#n=binary(n+1)[2..-1],i,10^(#n-i))*n~+10^#n\3 \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 27 2015
crossrefs: Cf. A032829 - A032833 (in other bases), A102659 (Lyndon words in this sequence), A007088 (digits 0 & 1), A007931 (digits 1 & 2), A032810 (digits 2 & 3), A256290 (digits 4 & 5), A256291 (digits 5 & 6), A256292 (digits 6 & 7), A256340 (digits 7 & 8), A256341 (digits 8 & 9).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Crossrefs added by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 27 2015
